sentences.english: Then he rushed into Mr Sun's kitchen to save her.
sentences.chinese: 然後他衝進孫奶奶家的廚房去救她。

sentences.english: Gambling shavings inadvertently found that the beneficiary on SunQiMing policy turned out to be yourself.
sentences.chinese: 奕茹無意中發現，孫啓鳴保單上的受益人竟然是自己。

sentences.english: Sun Weide, spokesman for the Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee, has urged that the Games not be politicized.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧組委發言人孫維德呼籲不要將奧運會政治化。

sentences.english: Sun, the Lehman Brothers economist, says as manufacturers are pushed to the brink, China's stock markets could see sharp declines.
sentences.chinese: 孫明春表示，製造商被推倒懸崖邊緣，中國股市大跌。

sentences.english: SunQiMing cannot bear to see, he came near and comfort on the girl.
sentences.chinese: 孫啓鳴看不慣，於是上前安慰起那個女孩。

sentences.english: In tears, Sun promised he would dw so.
sentences.chinese: 在流淚，孫答應他會幹重等。

sentences.english: The book that Mt. Sun wrote is the best book in the world.
sentences.chinese: 孫老師寫的書是世界上最好的書。

sentences.english: The Bureau Chief Sun voice just fell, the scene fan erupts the warm applause.
sentences.chinese: 孫局長的話音剛落，現場的球迷就爆發出熱烈的掌聲。

sentences.english: Sun`s back to parking his car in front of the teaching building.
sentences.chinese: 孫重新把車停在教學樓前面了。

sentences.english: Her native language is Mandarin and she is fluent in English.
sentences.chinese: 孫律師母語爲普通話，並精通英語。

sentences.english: Sun said nothing and smiled weakly, feeling a bit embarrassed.
sentences.chinese: 孫沒有說話，只是回上輕輕一笑，略覺尷尬。

sentences.english: Sun rushed to help her， only to find her clothes on the ground. She had disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 孫公子要去扶她，只見衣服在地上，人早沒影了。

sentences.english: SunQiMing come on them, says he is serious this time.
sentences.chinese: 孫啓鳴拜託他們，說自己這次是認真的。

sentences.english: Mr. Sun goes to a week.
sentences.chinese: 孫老師一週去看望他爺爺兩次。

sentences.english: And in special case, 4 bit codes from left can be used as code of grandchildren company.
sentences.chinese: 特殊情況下，可以只使用左起前4位碼代表孫公司。

sentences.english: SunQiMing ran downstairs, just to see the two of them.
sentences.chinese: 孫啓鳴跑到樓下，剛好看到他們兩個。
